intro_only_event_multi_christmasgift_202:
Time for presents! Here’s the greatest gift from
the greatest Champion!

On behalf of everyone from Galar, please accept
that gift as a small token of appreciation.
We truly appreciate everything you do!
Let’s keep having exciting battles, too!
Right, then! Shall we head on to the next delivery?

Yeah. We should get back to delivering presents
so we can meet up with Sonia!

Be sure to spend time with the people you
love, too!
And we hope you enjoy the winter soiree!
